node.title: Man sorry for throwing food at homeless person in viral video, blames it on being  'extremely drunk'
node.description: Man sorry for throwing food at homeless person in viral video, blames it on being  'extremely drunk'
node.content: ["A man who mocked and threw food at a homeless person in Auckland CBD in the weekend has apologised.\u00a0", "The interaction shocked Kiwis when a video of it emerged online.\u00a0In the footage, a person can be seen getting out of a car and throwing something, believed to be food, at a homeless person who is trying to sleep in a bus stop.\u00a0", "Another person then gets out of the car and throws something else at them.\u00a0", "Now a man, who claims he was involved in the vile interaction, has come forward to apologise.\u00a0", "In a social media post, he blamed his actions on being extremely drunk and said he's done a lot to help the homeless community in the past.\u00a0", "\"Just want it out there that I know what I did was completely f***ed up and I regret it so much,\" they said. \"I was extremely drunk. Please don't think I am proud of myself, I am truly paying for what I did and acknowledge what I did and hate myself for it.\"", "The person said they wished they could take it back and called it a \"stupid heartless mistake\".\u00a0", "\"I have helped the homeless so many times, literally two days before the incident I gave money to the homeless and I have volunteered at love soup five times which feed the homeless and less fortunate.\"", "He also said he has previously been homeless so he's not \"the privileged c*** I'm being played out to be\".\u00a0", "\"I am not making excuses I just wanted to apologise and show everyone I'm not just laughing about this I truly hate myself and wish I could take it back.\"", "Newshub was sent the video by concerned citizens after it began circulating online.\u00a0", "One person said the video was horrifying and people needed to know it wasn't okay.\u00a0", "\"These people\u2026 already have hard enough lives as it is without having food and drink thrown on them by people jumping out of cars and running up to them while they sleep in bus stops!\" they said.\u00a0", "\"These victims have nowhere to shower, or wash up after being assaulted, they have no one to turn to, they have no way to keep warm at night after being soaked with drink!\"", "Another person said the footage was \"absolutely disgusting\" and \"horrid\".\u00a0", "It comes as the number of people waiting for public housing has shot up in recent years to an estimated 23,687 households.", "Estimates based on 2018 Census data found 102,123 people are \"severely housing deprived\" - 2.2 percent of the population. And nearly half of those people are under 25.\u00a0", "The figures include the estimated 41,724 people living without shelter, in temporary accommodation or sharing accommodation and 60,399 who live in \"uninhabitable housing\".\u00a0 \u00a0"]
